This year I'd like to run a campaign, starting from soon until the end of the year.   

# Forgotten Realms 
![](/images/articles/dnd.jpg)  

**Game system:** Dungeons & Dragons 5E  
**Pick this if you like the sound of:** Classic high magic fantasy roleplaying action and adventure, immersion in the official world of D&D 5E, all rules per the Players Handbook and Dungeon Masters Guide. Sandbox in and around and through the published adventures, starting in the Sword Coast.  

# Plunder and Power 
![](/images/articles/HSI_player_map.jpg)  

**Game system:** Dungeons & Dragons 5E + Hot Springs Island      
**Pick this if you like the sound of:** Explore a jungle island, earn gold and glory. Jungles, intriguing factions, swashbuckling, exploration, strange flora and fauna, ancient elvish civilization.  

# Escape From Hell
![](/images/articles/veins-of-the-earth.png)  

**Game system:** Lamentations Of The Flame Princess  
**Pick this if you like the sound of:** Grim survival deep underground, countdown, claustrophobia, strange environments, even stranger creatures, madness


----------



# Adventures In An Age Undreamed Of   
![](/images/articles/conan.jpg)  

**Game system:** Conan 2d20    
**Pick this if you like the sound of:** Explore Hyboria, classic Sword-and-Sorcery, low magic, high adventure

# Red Undead Redemption
![](/images/articles/deadlands.jpg)  

**Game system:** Deadlands  
**Pick this if you like the sound of:** Cast spells with poker hands, steampunk

# Carcosa
![](/images/articles/carcosa.png)  

**Game system:** Lamentations Of The Flame Princess    
**Pick this if you like the sound of:**  Otherworld, alien science, evil magic, grim Masters-Of-The-Universe
